timeline.bodyText: I wonder if this should be inlided as is now or whether the better approach would be like with numeric and temporal values. So extracting them into a separate section and show the data mapping based on the config property setting.

replies.bodyText: I was contemplating about it, too. But I don't think it's worth it for this single one. Perhaps for MySQL, but actually I'd prefer to have one single table with all the props, i.e. converge on this style added here.
